title: Then and Now
description: This book is no longer purchasable. It's an unpublished work.Alternate Cover Edition for B00LLIBVAIIt's been ten years since author Jana Monroe saw her high school sweetheart, Avid Evans. With a random invite to her ten-year high school reunion she's brought face-to-face with her past. Finding that spark is still there between them, new obstacles are ahead. His celebrity musician status could ruin things before they begin and she's forced to face the fact their fling was nothing more than that.
author: L. Bachman
